note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Install placard "FORWARD CARGO COMP HEATING SYS INOP" below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar circuit breaker for inoperative heater(s):
For the Left heater, open and collar the P414 panel CARGO HTR PWR LEFT FWD circuit breaker.
For the Right heater, open and collar the P415 panel CARGO HTR PWR RIGHT FWD circuit breaker.

note.para: Status message(s) CARGO HEAT FWD L and/or CARGO HEAT FWD R may remain displayed.
